nodes.text: Star Wars Weekly 50 is the fiftieth issue in the Marvel Star Wars UK series of comics. Edited by Dez Skinn, the title was revamped as part of his "Marvel Revolution" to appeal directly to fans of the film by including photo-covers and features in addition to the existing comic strips.
This issue includes part four of a four-part black & white reprinting of the story The Keeper's World, originally published in color in Marvel Comics' Pizzazz magazine.
